short_summary: Acquisition of IT cabinets for Severs Rooms, as well as installation of the acquired equipment.
tags: Electrical equipment and components and supplies
full_summary:
_Tender Notice - W6369-24DE12_
===============

**Business Identifier:** cb-9327-56904909
**Solicitation Number:** W6369-24DE12
**Publication Date:** September 21, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 6, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (EDT)

The Department of National Defence is issuing a SOLICITATION NOTICE for the acquisition of IT cabinets for Server Rooms, as well as the installation of the acquired equipment.

**Procurement Details**
------------------------

* Category: Goods and Services
* Category Type: Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive (Traditional)
* Procurement Category: G-OH

**Delivery/Service Location:** Quebec

**Trade Agreements:** This procurement is open to all qualified vendors and is subject to Canada's trade agreements, including the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the New NAFTA.

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------

The Contracting Entity for this procurement is the Director of Electronic Systems Procurement 3, Department of National Defence, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2.

**Technical Specifications**
---------------------------

The procured IT cabinets must meet the following specifications:

* Electrical components
* Electrical equipment and components and supplies
* Computer rack component
* Network system equipment rack

**Evaluation Criteria**: The vendor that submits the lowest price will be awarded the contract.

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

Juan Saenz can be contacted at (343) 596-7090 or via email at [juan.saenz@forces.gc.ca](mailto:juan.saenz@forces.gc.ca).

**Notice URL:** The full solicitation package can be accessed on the Government of Canada’s Buy and Sell website at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/trade-agreements/agreements-with-canada/canada-european-union-economic-partnership-agreement](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/trade-agreements/agreements-with-canada/canada-european-union-economic-partnership-agreement).

**Attachments**

* Amendment 1 [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/11574/w6369-24de12-npp-amendment-1%28en_0.pdf)
* Solicitation Notice [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9327/w6369-24de
